Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43896 affecting package powershell for versions less than 7.2.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-43896 affecting package powershell for versions less than 7.2.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package powershell is earlier than 7.2.1-1, affected by CVE-2021-43896
